apps.name: Positive Thinker
apps.localizedDescription: This is an app to add positive vibes in tour life

privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: App saves photos to your Photo Library.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: App uses camera to take photos.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: App need access to Photo Library to analyse and help you to see life on the good side.
